trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were 3 other sightings in Albuquerque on or around September 20th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: big, if a full moon is a silver dollar, this was a dime, very bright
divs: Sighting Detailsim a truckdriver, i have seen ufo's before, this one was visible for about 15 minutes. started out as a very big bright light, if a full moon was a silver dollar, this was a dime, i could make out that it was triangle in shape, it moved a little bit but mostly stationary, until the thing separated then it was two objects, at this point one stayed still the other moved down below, a long way, then moved to the right, straight across from the stationary one, then it moved directly above the stationary one, at this point they both started to move and then they were gone. i do have photos (phone camara) the pictures dont show what it is but they do show what it is not. i know alot of people saw it because it was there for so long, i told other truck drivers about it on the cb.i was headed east, this appeared to the north.
